title: Is ER good on sivir?
body: Got the freee skin for this season so i figgure i may as well give her a few tries and see if i'm any less horrible with her since season 3.   It sounds like ER into shiv would be pretty good for her since shes pretty mana hungry and loves to wave clear. Then again, she obliterates waves without shiv as it so maybe rapidifre instead?
